sentences.en: A character's Initiative helps him a high standing in the Initiative roster.
sentences.cn: 玩家的先攻帮助他在先攻顺序中获得较高的位置.

sentences.en: Arrange the travel for all the employees'roster break.
sentences.cn: 负责员工工作旅行和休假旅行车辆的统筹安排.

sentences.en: Examine the club's roster of filled and unfilled classifications.
sentences.cn: 检视扶轮社的填补及未填补的职业分类名册.

sentences.en: From the studio's roster of leading men, Robert Walker was an obvious choice to play the part.
sentences.cn: 从该电影公司的男主角名单来看，罗伯特·沃克显然是出演这一角色的不二人选。

sentences.en: Gotta see how they fit with roster and system.
sentences.cn: 必须要看他们能否适应阵容和体系.

sentences.en: He a rock on the team and brings leadership to the roster.
sentences.cn: 他是球队的基石并且领导着队友们.

sentences.en: Normal working condition. Do not have to work on shift - roster.
sentences.cn: 正常工作条件, 不存在特殊工作要求(如高空、倒班等).
用当前的阵容肯定不行!

sentences.en: Reduce fatigue of operation personnel by logical organization duty roster.
sentences.cn: 科学地组织排班减少操作人员疲劳.

sentences.en: That's what Nash has done with an entire roster.
sentences.cn: 那就是纳什已经使全体队员做到的.

sentences.en: The Amateur Softball Association's roster of umpires has declined to 57,000.
sentences.cn: 业余垒球协会的裁判员名单上的人数已经减少到了57,000名。

sentences.en: The coach scratched three names from the players'roster.
sentences.cn: 教练从选手名单上勾掉了3个名字.

sentences.en: The Heat's roster is studded with stars who never won a title.
sentences.cn: 热火的阵容中点缀着一些从未得到过总冠军的球星.

sentences.en: The teacher checked the roster to see whom he would teach this year.
sentences.cn: 老师查看花名册,想了解今年要教的学生.

sentences.en: The Yankees are bringing six other catchers to camp on non - roster invitations.
sentences.cn: 洋基也提供其他六名捕手非正式名单的春训邀请.

trans.tran_en: a list of the names of people on a sports team, in an organization etc
